channel.description: Recent content in Kerberos on Room362

item.title: Kerberoasting - Part 3
item.description: Previous works: There has been a number of different blog posts, presentations and projects that have happened before this post and I will reference a number of them during the post and at the end have a link to all that I know about. If you know of any works on this subject that I am missing please submit a comment below and I’ll will be sure to reference it.
